---
title: "MultiCall3"
description: Batching calls on Arthera
---

Several DeFi projects need a MultiCall3 contract to operate, this is the official MultiCall3 info :

- contract address on Arthera Mainnet: **[0xcA11bde05977b3631167028862bE2a173976CA11](https://explorer.arthera.net/address/0xcA11bde05977b3631167028862bE2a173976CA11?tab=contract)**
- contract address on Arthera Testnet: **[0xcA11bde05977b3631167028862bE2a173976CA11](https://explorer-test.arthera.net/address/0xcA11bde05977b3631167028862bE2a173976CA11?tab=contract)**

You can view the MultiCall3 contract source code and ABI on the [explorer](https://explorer.arthera.net/address/0xcA11bde05977b3631167028862bE2a173976CA11?tab=contract) or on [GitHub](https://github.com/mds1/multicall/).

:::info

_Latest update: [April 25, 2024](https://github.com/artheranet/arthera-docs/issues/104)_

:::
